sarva ākāra dharam ca eva sarva ākāra vivarjitam
sarvatas pāṇi pādam ca sarvatas akṣi śiraḥ mukham
prasanna raśmi jālena sphaṭika amala rūpiṇā
sva deha nissṛtena eva bhāsitam paritas prabhum
pratibimbati vai yasmin mantra cakram yathā sthitam
dhyāyet sapta akṣaram mantram bhogasthāna gatam mune
evam dhyātvā samabhyarcya yathā nyāsa krameṇa ca
arghaiḥ pādyaiḥ tathā puṣpaiḥ su gandhaiḥ anulepanaiḥ
śāli pūrṇa utthita āghāra pṛṣṭha saṃsthaiḥ anekaśas
su gandha ghṛta dīpaiḥ ca puṣpa ālambana carcitaiḥ
mahā āmodaiḥ śubha uddipaiḥ acchinnaiḥ guggula anvitaiḥ
bhakṣyaiḥ bhojyaiḥ tathā lehyaiḥ peyaiḥ anyaiḥ anekadhā
madhuparkaiḥ ca mātrābhiḥ phala mūlaiḥ anekaśas
pāyasaiḥ vividhaiḥ divyaiḥ modakaiḥ kṛsara ādibhiḥ
su saṃskṛtaiḥ ca bahubhiḥ madhu ājya ādi pariplutaiḥ

original: ekaikasmiṃstu vai bhoge mudrāṃ kāmadughāṃ purā || 173 ||
analyzed: ekaikasmin tu vai bhoge mudrām kāmadughām purā
sa mantrām pūrvavat dhyāyet prokṣayeḥ darghya vāriṇā
da tvā puṣpa arghyam upari saṃspṛśet viṣṇu pāṇinā
nivedayet tatas vipra śirasā avanatena ca

original: yatkiñcanmānase yāge purā proktaṃ mayā ca te || 175 ||
analyzed: yat kiñcan mānase yāge purā proktam mayā ca te
tat sarvam devadevasya bahu mūrtam nivedayet
asannidhiḥ ca yaḥ bhogaḥ hi aṅga bhāvam anuvrajet
tat tat dhyātvā tu manasā bhaktyā viṣṇoḥ nivedayet
yathā anukramataḥ hi evam sarva mantra gaṇam mune

original: iṣṭvā pūrvaṃ vidhānena bhūyaḥ saṃpūjya keśavam |
analyzed: iṣṭvā pūrvam vidhānena bhūyas saṃpūjya keśavam
mūlamantram samuccārya puṣpaiḥ āpūrya ca añjalim
tad madhye paramātmānam mantram māṇikya dīdhitim
samasta mantra saṃlīnam dhyāyet uddhāra yogataḥ
pūraka ādi vibhāgena śabdena atipluta ātmanā
yāvat śabda avasāna sthaḥ vyajyate asau anekadhā

original: p. 121) tantrīśabdātmanā vipra tato bhāsātmanā tu vai |
analyzed: tantrī śabda ātmanā vipra tatas bhāsa ātmanā tu vai
hlāda ātmanā ca tadanu ānanda vibhava ātmanā
tasmāt sarva pada atītaḥ sarvatra vibhava ātmanā
evam ṣaṣ ūrmi nirmuktam vikalpa atīta gocaram
avagāhya krameṇa atha punar etya padāt padam
dhyātvā mantram sahastrāṃśum sahasra kara ja amṛtam
recakena vinikṣipya devadevasya mūrdhani

original: tato'chinnaṃ kare kṛtvā dhūpapātraṃ tu dakṣiṇe |
analyzed: kare kṛtvā dhūpa pātram tu dakṣiṇe
dhūpa pātra vidhiḥ
padma cakra aṅkitam divyam ādhāram kañja rūpiṇam

original: ekanālaṃ ca kartavyaṃ (kurvīta ?) śeṣaṃ saptaphaṇaṃ vibhum |
analyzed: eka nālam ca kartavyam kurvīta śeṣam sapta phaṇam vibhum
baddhāñjali puṭam nityam dhyāyantam kāraṇam param
cakra lāṅgala hastam ca padmāsana gatam vibhum
kartavyam kurvīta dhūpa gharttāram kiṅkiṇī jāla śobhitam  /
cakram tat cakra hṛdayam padmam hṛd koṭaram viduḥ

original: cakre yā yā (ye ye ?) arākhyā (ssyu ?)stā nāḍyo vai dvādaśa smṛtāḥ ||
analyzed: cakre yāḥ yāḥ ye ye nāḍyaḥ vai dvādaśa smṛtāḥ

original: kiṅkiṇyo yāḥ smṛtā vipra jñeyāstāḥ sūkṣmanāḍayaḥ |
analyzed: kiṅkiṇyaḥ yāḥ smṛtāḥ vipra jñeyāḥ tāḥ sūkṣma nāḍayaḥ
yāsām vai madhyamā śaktiḥ bhujaṅga kuṭila upamā
dhūma dhūsara varṇa ābhā aṇḍam vinirgatā

original: kālāgnihṛdayotthā sā satyānte tu layaṃ gatā || 190 ||
analyzed: kālāgni hṛdaya utthā sā satya ante tu layam gatā
tayā saṃbodhitaḥ hi ātmā mantra mūrti dharaḥ prabhuḥ
sannidhau bhavati kṣipram avyucchinnam dahet tathā
dhūpa pātra mantra vidhānam
mantreṇa anena viprarṣe tat mantram avadhāraya
oṅkāram pūrvam uddhṛtya paramātmā tatas punar
vyomānandena saṃyuktam anantāya padam tatas
kālāgni rūpāya padam jagat dhūma padam tathā
sugandhine padam kuryāt sarva gandha vahāya ca
namaḥ svāhā samāyuktam ekatriṃśa akṣaram param
mantram dvija samākhyātam dhūpa pātrasya nārada
mudrā dhyāna samāyuktam ktāṃ sarva siddhi karam rīṃ param rām
pūjitām dhūpitām liptām mantra vinyasta vigrahām
ekīkṛtya sva śabdena hṛd gatena antarātmanā
sañcālayet tatas samyak sa śabdām cakra cinhitām
trailokya drāviṇīm ghaṇṭām sarva duṣṭa nibarhiṇīm

original: eṣā dūtī hi mantrāṇāṃ suptānāṃ ca prabodhinī |
analyzed: eṣā dūtī hi mantrāṇām suptānām ca prabodhinī
praṇava ante dhvaniḥ hi eṣa śabda śaktau layam gataḥ
varṇa dehāḥ smṛtāḥ mantrāḥ mantra dehāḥ ca devatāḥ
ghaṇṭā stanita mūlāḥ te prabuddhāḥ karma siddhi dāḥ
para śabda utthitā śaktiḥ ghaṇṭā stanita rūpiṇī
varṇa tvam samanuprāptā taiḥ varṇaiḥ muni sattama
mantrāṇām kalpanā dehāḥ nānā ākārāḥ sahasraśas
sva icchayā tu anayā śaktyā sāmarthyāt sva ātmanaḥ svayam
anugraha artham iha hi bhaktānām bhāvitātmanām
mananāt muni śārdūla trāṇam kurvanti vai tatas
dadate padam ātmīyam tasmāt mantrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
anabhivyakta śabdāḥ te nirākārāḥ tathā eva ca
ghaṇṭāyām cālyamānāyām niryānti ca sahasraśas
atas eva muni śreṣṭha mantramātā prakīrtitā
eṣā ghaṇṭā abhidhā śaktiḥ vāgīśī ca sarasvatī

original: vāci mantrāḥ sthitāssarve vācyā mantre pratiṣṭhitāḥ |
analyzed: vāci mantrāḥ sthitāḥ sarve vācyāḥ mantre pratiṣṭhitāḥ
mantra rūpa ātmakam viśvam sa bāhya abhyantaram tatas
ghaṇṭā śabda gatam sarvam tasmāt tām cālayet purā
āvāhana īrghye dhūpe ca dīpe naivedya joṣaṇe
nityam eva prayuñjīta samyak mantra artha siddhaye

original: p. 123) pūjākālaṃ vinā'nyatra hitaṃ nāsyāḥ pracālanam || 208 ||
analyzed: pūjā kālam vinā anyatra hitam na asyāḥ pracālanam  /

original: nānayā tu vinā kāryaṃ pūjanaṃ siddhimicchatā |
analyzed: na anayā tu vinā kāryam pūjanam siddhim icchatā
yasmāt tasmāt param mantram etadīyam idam śṛṇu
ādāya praṇavam pūrvam ananta īśam tatas param
tat ca analena saṃbhinnam ūrdhva adhas muni sattama
trailokya aiśvarya dena atha lāñchayet pañcabindunā
dadyāt asya avasāne tu jagat dhvani padam tatas
mantra mātre padam ca anyat svāhā akṣara samanvitam
tad ante paramātmānam prajñā ādhāra upari sthitam
bhūdhareṇa yutam mūrdhnā bhūdhara upari vinyaset
viśva āpyāya kara antastham trailokya aiśvarya dam mune
trayodaśa akṣaraḥ mantraḥ ghaṇṭā ākhyaḥ sarva siddhi kṛt
vinyāsa kāle yasyāḥ vai plutam uccārayet tatas
dhyāna yuktam dvijaśreṣṭha tat dhyānam avadhāraya
adhomukham tu brahmāṇḍam dhyāyet jana rava ākulam

original: sanālaṃ ca tadūrdhve tu padmamaṣṭadalaṃ tathā |
analyzed: sa nālam ca tad ūrdhve tu padmam aṣṭa dalam tathā
prakīrṇa patram su sitam ta kesara alam liṃ su karṇikam  /
tad madhye cintayet devīm varga aṣṭaka bhuja anvitām
mukhya hasta catuṣke tu lāñchanam kamala ādikam

original: kamalaṃ ca tataḥ śaṅkhaṃ pāśaṃ caivāṅkuśaṃ kramāt |
analyzed: kamalam ca tatas śaṅkham pāśam ca eva aṅkuśam kramāt
sphaṭikam ca akṣasūtram ca tathā vijñānapustakam
abhayam varadam ca eva hasta dvi dvitaye pare
padmāsane ca upaviṣṭhām padma patra āyata īkṣaṇām
padmagarbha pratīkāśām padma mālā vibhūṣitām
vidyā ābharaṇa saṃchannām pīta vastra viveṣṭitām
darśayet devadevasya mudrām nārāyaṇa ātmanaḥ
lakṣmī ādi mantrāṇām abhyarcanam

original: lakṣmyādīnāṃ tato bhaktyā mantrāṇāṃ ca mahāmune || 221 ||
analyzed: lakṣmī ādīnām tatas bhaktyā mantrāṇām ca mahā mune
atha stutiḥ
tatas stuvīta deveśam stotreṇa anena nārada
samyak praṇava pūrveṇa namaḥ ntena tu vai tridhā
jita ante puṇḍarīkākṣa namaḥ te viśvabhāvana
namaḥ teḥ tu hṛṣīkeśa mahāpuruṣa pūrvaja
madhuparka ādi samarpaṇa prakāraḥ
japan vai dadhi saṃpūrṇam madhunā sarpiṣā anvitam

original: pātraṃ karatale kṛtvā tanmadhyasthaṃ prabhuṃ smaret |
analyzed: pātram kara tale kṛtvā tad madhya stham prabhum smaret
mūlamantreṇa tat vastu svarūpāt uditena ca
lasat pīyūṣa kallola sat taraṅgeṇa nārada
tat nivedya punar bhaktyā bhūyas puṣpa añjalim kṣipet
tatas nivedayet viṣṇoḥ hiraṇya kaṭaka ādikam
anantaram nimitta artham tāmbūlam tad anantaram
prakṣālya gandha toyena arghya pātra uddhṛtena vai
pāṇi yugmam yathā vai syāt sārdham atyanta nirmalam
naivedya dhūpa pātra ādyaiḥ pātraiḥ ca nirmalīkṛtam
kṛtvā tad gandha digdhau tau arghyeṇa arcya parasparam
tat nivedya vibhoḥ paścāt vāc karma manasā anvitaḥ
bāhyayāga parisamāpana kramaḥ
puṇḍarīkākṣa viśvātman mantra mūrte janārdana
gṛhāṇa idam jagannātha mama dīnasya śāśvata
iti uktvā sa udakam puṣpam kṛtvā dakṣiṇa pāṇi gam
agratas nikṣipet viṣṇoḥ mūlamantreṇa nārada
bhāvayet ca tatas samyak sphurantīm tāraka āvalīm
praviṣṭām bhava gat vakre vakra antāt hṛd gatām punar
hṛdayāt dvijaśārdūla saṃhāra ākhya krameṇa tu
pūrvavat brahmarandhreṇa pareṇa saha yojayet

original: bhagavantaṃ tato nattvā aṣṭāṃgena tu bhaktitaḥ || 234 ||
analyzed: bhagavantam tatas nattvā aṣṭāṃgena tu bhaktitaḥ
samutthāya āsanāt tasmin arghya puṣpe vinikṣipet
yasmāt tat kṣaṇa mantram tu na śūnyam saṃparityajet
ajñānāt jñānataḥ vā api yātam ūna adhikam ca yat
dāsasya mama dīnasya kṣantavyam loka locana
iti śrī pāñcarātre jayākhyam sahitāyām bāhyayāgākhyānam nāma
trayodaśaḥ paṭalaḥ
atha japavidhānam nāma caturdaśaḥ paṭalaḥ
nāradaḥ
brūhi me devadeveśa viṣṇoḥ vibhavam ātmanaḥ

original: nirṇayaṃ japayajñasya na jñātaṃ tatkathaṃ bhavet || 1 ||
analyzed: nirṇayam japa yajñasya na jñātam tat katham bhavet
śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: evaṃ santarpya deveśaṃ kumbhe vā maṇḍalādiṣu |
analyzed: evam santarpya deveśam kumbhe vā maṇḍala ādiṣu
japa yajña vidhānena devam santarpayet tatas
tadā sa sarva kāma arthān manasā iṣṭān prayacchati
japasya traividhyam
japam tu trividham kuryāt akṣa sūtra kara arpitaḥ
vācikam kṣudra karmabhyaḥ upāṃśum siddhi karmaṇi
mānasam mokṣa kama artham dhyāyet devam tu sarvatas
akṣasūtram śubham kāryam adṛśyam itaraiḥ janaiḥ
akṣasūtra vidhānam tatra maṇi pramāṇa ādi viśeṣāḥ
akṣa asthi mātraiḥ maṇibhiḥ jyeṣṭham kuryāt su varttulam
ghātrī phalānām garbheṇa pramāṇam madhyamam smṛtam
badara asthi pramāṇena kanīyaḥ samudāhṛtam
aṣṭottaraśatam pūrṇam tad ardham pādam eva vā
kuryāt tat ca vidhāna uktam vidhinā pratikarmaṇi
sauvarṇam dravya sidhi artham uttamam tatra kārayet
puṣṭi artham rūpa lābhāya rājatam pitṛ karmaṇi
medhā vīrya mahā tejaḥ lābha artham tāmram eva ca
madhyamam muni śārdūla kāryam ca eva akṣa sūtrakam

original: p. 126) yakṣāṇāṃ yakṣiṇīnāṃ ca sādhane trapujaṃ smṛtam |
analyzed: yakṣāṇām yakṣiṇīnām ca sādhane trapu jam smṛtam

original: rākṣasānāṃ piśācānāṃ vaśe sīsamayaṃ tu vai || 10 ||
analyzed: rākṣasānām piśācānām vaśe sīsa mayam tu vai
pātāla sādhana artham tu arīti mayam ucyate
sa pannagānām nāgānām sādhane syāt tu kāṃsya jam
kanīyaḥ tu tadā kuryāt āyasam kṣudra karmaṇi

original: iti dhātumayānāṃ ca sūtrāṇāṃ vidhayaḥ smṛtāḥ || 12 ||
analyzed: iti dhātu mayānām ca sūtrāṇām vidhayaḥ smṛtāḥ
vakṣye maṇi mayānām ca vibhāgam muni sattama
sarvam maṇi mayam ca eva āyuḥ ārogya bhūti dam
mokṣa dam tu viśeṣeṇa sphāṭikam śānti karmaṇi
tritayam ca uttama ādyam yat samam sarveṣu karmasu
mūla jānām atho vakṣye bījānām vidhim uttamam
saubhāgye vaidrumam kāryam uttama ādyam sadā trayam
mukti artham putra dīptaiḥ tu puṣpaṣaiḥ dos praśāntaye
vakṣye jala utthitānām ca viṣayam sarva siddhi dam
padma bījaiḥ ca śāṅkhaiḥ ca śrī kāmaḥ japam ārabhet
āyuḥ prajñā yaśaḥ śāntau mauktikam sarva siddhi dam
uttama ādi vibhāgena tritayam yat prakīrtitam

original: ebhyo madhyādekatamaṃ grāhyaṃ caiva śubhe dine || 18 ||
analyzed: ebhyaḥ madhyāt ekatamam grāhyam ca eva śubhe dine
maṇīnām kṣālana prakāraḥ
sa astreṇa gandha toyena kṣālayet tad anantaram
sūtra viśeṣa vidhānam

original: śāṇaṃ kārpāsakaṃ vā'tha prāpya sūtraṃ navaṃ dṛḍham || 19 ||
analyzed: śāṇam kārpāsakam vā atha prāpya sūtram navam dṛḍham

original: triguṇaṃ triguṇīkṛtya caturthā vā yathā dṛḍham |
analyzed: triguṇam triguṇīkṛtya caturthā vā yathā dṛḍham
su veṣṭitam tu vai kṛtvā kṣālayet pūrvavat dvija
sūtre maṇīnām yojana prakāraḥ
nikṣepyāḥ maṇayaḥ tasmin sandhāna krama yuktitaḥ
maṇayaḥ su samāḥ sarve ūna ādhikya vivarjitāḥ
japa artham muni śārdūla nityam mantreṣu niṣkale
maṇibhiḥ kramasūtraiḥ tu niṣkale

original: p. 127) sakale tu yathecchā vai sūtrārthaṃ maṇigolakāḥ | (?)
analyzed: sakale tu yathā icchā vai sūtra artham maṇi golakāḥ
yugalam yugalam sūtre paraspara mukham dvija

original: pṛṣṭhaṃ pṛṣṭhasya lagnaṃ vā yathā syādyojayettathā |
analyzed: pṛṣṭham pṛṣṭhasya lagnam vā yathā syāt yojayet tathā
sandhāya ca ati su śliṣṭam gahanam na bhavet yathā
akṣa sūtrasya valaya ākāra tā āpādanam
paraspara maṇīnām tu protānām muni sattama
avyucchinnena tena eva tu ekena prota tantunā
maṇibhyām saṅgama uddeśāt sūtram sūtreṇa veṣṭayet
yathā syāt kaṭaka ākāram stabdham vṛttam vibhaktimat
akṣa sūtre meru kalpanam
grandhisandhāvataḥ vipra maṇi sakhya adhikam tatas
merum prakalpayet madhye ekena gulikena ca
akṣasūtra saṃśodhana avadhānam
vilipya candana ādyaiḥ tu sthāpayet bhājane śubhe
saṃpūjya puṣpa dhūpa ādyaiḥ tasya śuddhim atha ācaret
dagdham astreṇa saṃcintya varmaṇā māruta īritam
āplāvya mūlamantreṇa parama amṛta rūpiṇā
saṃśodhya evam purā sūtram deha vat cintayet tatas
akṣasūtrasya divya deha tvena cintanam
catur bhujam tu virajaḥ nārāyaṇam iva aparam
varada abhaya hastam ca baddhāñjali dharam smaret
brahmadvāra sthitam tat ca sūtram dhyāyet śikhā upamam
sva mantreṇa dvijaśreṣṭha mantram atra nibodhatu
akṣasūtra mantraḥ
proddharet praṇavam pūrvam tad ante kaustubham nyaset
trailokya aiśvarya da upetam gopanena aṅkayet ca tat
tad ante tu akṣa sūtrāya padam pañca akṣaram nyaset  /
namaskāra anvitaḥ proktaḥ hi akṣasūtrasya mantra rāj
sva mantreṇa akṣa sūtrasya sakalīkaraṇa pūjane
sakalīkaraṇam kuryāt mantreṇa anena tasya vai
pūjayet ca sva mantreṇa tatas tad sanghaye kramāt
vaiṣṇavyāḥ para śakteḥ akṣa sūtre bhāvanā krama vidhānam
yā parā vaiṣṇavī śaktiḥ abhinnā paramātmanaḥ  /
pracalat pūrṇa candra ābhā sūrya vat kiraṇa āvṛtā
yuga kṣaya ugra hutabhuj tejasā tīvṛ bṛṃhitā
prāgvat sṛṣṭi krameṇa eva smaret hṛd padma madhya gām
pūrakeṇa tu vipra indra kumbhakena nirodhitām
hṛd padmāt utthitām bhūyas brahmarandhra avadhim smaret
brahmarandhrāt tatas vipra prollasantīm śanais śanais
pūrvavat sandhi mārgeṇa cintayet dvādaśānta gām

original: recakākhyena yogena tayā sūtraṃ tu bhāvayet || 39 ||
analyzed: recaka ākhyena yogena tayā sūtram tu bhāvayet
akṣasūtra prabhā udbhāsita tvena yāga ālaya smaraṇam

original: bhāsitaṃ cātha sūtreṇa sarvaṃ yāgālayaṃ smaret |
analyzed: bhāsitam ca atha sūtreṇa sarvam yāga ālayam smaret
pūrṇa indunā iva gaganam
mantra ātmanaḥ bhagavat chatteḥ sūtrasya mantra akṣarāṇām
ca ekībhūta tva bhāvana vidhiḥ
niṣkalaḥ mantrarāj tatas
mantra bṛnda samāyuktaḥ magnaḥ tatra iti cintayet
mantra ātmā bhagavat śaktiḥ sūtra mantra akṣarāṇi vai
sarvam ekīkṛtam dhyāyet yathā kṣīreṇa sa udakam
sakala niṣkala mantrasya sṛṣṭi krameṇa akṣasūtre sānnidhya cintanam
tatra puṣpa añjalau pṛṣṭhe gṛhītvā cintayet imam
su saṃskṛta akṣa sūtrasya patantam pṛṣṭhatas dvija
sṛṣṭi kramāt samāyātam mantram sakala niṣkalam
sphuliṅga gaṇa saṅkāśam ādheya tanu tām gatam

original: dale dale tridhā dadyāt hṛdbījaṃ kesarāvadhau || 67 ||

likhet kuṇḍala yogena śirasā ca atha veṣṭayet  /

original: p. 359) pūrayetsakalaṃ bāhyāccaturasraṃ puraṃ tu tat |
